divs: Sighting DetailsI was puting a light on my bike at about seven fifty. I went out side to see if my light worked and looked up in the sky and saw a light in the sky at first I thought it was just a airplain then I noticed it was not moving but it sounded odd so I ran inside and got my binoculars then watched it. It would spin then stop and made an odd noise. I watched it for about an hour. Just about as I was about to go in it flew away very very fast!
trends: There have been no other sightings in sterling
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: first I saw a light in the sky and ran in the house and got the binoculars. I watched it for about an hour it was also making a un explainable noise then disapered realy fast.
